content.rendered:
Nearly three decades after the discovery of the T-Virus, an outbreak reveals the dark secrets of the Umbrella Corporation.

Number of seasons: 1 (2022- )

Status: Ongoing

Channel: Netflix

Creator: Andrew Dabb

Starring: Ella Balinska, Tamara Smart, Siena Agudong
